section.title: Asides: A collection of information pages
section.paragraph: Understanding units will explain the difference between the four types of units in CellML, and how to create them using libCellML.
Constants vs variables will help you understand the different ways in which variable elements are assigned value, and what each means to your whole modelâ€™s interpretation.
